select.if: select a.*, (select name from tblTheater where theater_seq = a.theater_seq) as theater_name, (select name from tblMovie where movie_seq = a.movie_seq) as movie_name, (select story from tblMovie where movie_seq = a.movie_seq) as story, (select img from tblMovie where movie_seq = a.movie_seq) as img, nvl((select 'y' from tblTheaterClose where to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between start_date and end_date and theater_seq = a.theater_seq), 'n') as close from tblMovieplay a order by movie_play_seq desc

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblMoviePlay (movie_play_seq, movie_seq, time, start_date, end_date, theater_seq) VALUES (seqtblMoviePlay.NEXTVAL, #{movie_seq}, #{time}, TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{theater_seq})
mapper.update: update tblMoviePlay set time = #{time}, start_date = TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), end_date = TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), theater_seq = #{theater_seq}
